Articles.Content:
Greetings, people of Kerbin!

Couple of friends mentioned this game the other day and I decided to take a look into what it was. After a few Youtube videos I found myself almost choking from laughing so hard, so I decided to go ahead and buy the game. Best purchase I\'ve made in a long time. Last night I finally managed to get my first guy into a stable orbit around the planet! Much celebrating was had.

At the moment, I\'m attempting to build my first Mun Lander. But my lack of engineering skills is showing, there\'s a lot of fireworks in the air above the space center!

I can\'t wait to see what\'s coming next for this amazing game. And hopefully I\'ll find the time visit these great forums as much as possible.
Congratulations! Are you using the 3-man pod? If so, use the 1-man pod. The 3-man parts are in a middle-of-the-road stage, so they\'re pretty unstable.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Congratulations! Are you using the 3-man pod? If so, use the 1-man pod. The 3-man parts are in a middle-of-the-road stage, so they\'re pretty unstable.

Thanks for the tip, I\'ll keep it in mind.

Though my biggest problem at the moment is just getting the damn thing off the ground.
